name: Doominoes: The Great Flood
description:
You play as a non-believer when Noah's flood arrived. Try to survive the flood.

Encounters and reactions are played out using domino pieces.

Created for the Choose Your Own Halloween Jam by celeryman, with the theme of "Don't touch the water"

Mouse highly encouraged (trackpad is difficult to control with).

No controller support.

Controls:

E to draw a piece from the bank
Right click to pan
Scroll wheel to zoom
R to rotate a piece
U to restart run
K to go to main menu
